Class DataViewHitsWithLexAnnotations

java.lang.Object
eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs.DataView
eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs.DataViewHits
eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs.DataViewHitsWithLexAnnotations
public class DataViewHitsWithLexAnnotations extends DataViewHits
A Data View implementation that stores the content of a (Lex)HITS Data View. The HITS Data View with optional kind attributes.
